text:
It looks like HubSpot has finally deprecated the old nav menu - I will be pushing an update hopefully today or later this weekend to update the extension, dropping support for the old nav.

This backward support does not affect your ability to use any of the tools and features of the extension. Removal of the support may make the extension more stable and slightly faster.

small dark theme tweak needed if anyone wants to hop on it - I’ve been getting reports that for some people the dark theme’s active tab isn’t obvious enough for those with bad eyes.
Proposed solution is to make the active tabs background color slightly lighter to make it more obvious.
This fix only requires css knowledge
The thought being I often toggle the deve menu off when I need to show clients how to do something in the design manager - that way I don’t confuse them with dark themed awesomeness.
so it’d be good for those moments where you don’t want it permanently you just want it for a short period of time.
